hymn.title: The spirit of the prophet
hymn.chords: | C - - - | C - C/G - | C - C/E - | G - G/D - | G - G/D - | G - G/D - | G7 - G7/B - | C - C/G - | C - C/G - | C - C/G - | C7 - C7/E - | F - - A/E | Dm - Dm/A Dm | C/G G G/D - | C/G G7 G7/B - | C - F/C - | C - - - |

layout.singingstanza: The spir -- it of the pro -- phet Is sub -- ject to the pro -- phet; The word de -- clares it so. I don't have to wait for an in -- spir -- a -- tion, My spir -- it is rea -- dy to go. I don't have to live ac -- cord -- ing to my feel -- ings, Or wait for a bet -- ter day. I can turn, I can call, "Lord Je -- sus!"

lyrics.stanza: The spirit of the prophet Is subject to the prophet; The word declares it so. I don't have to wait for an inspiration, My spirit is ready to go. I don't have to live according to my feelings, Or wait for a better day. I can turn, I can call, "Lord Jesus!"
